data.text: @SenTedCruz Wow what about your constituents who do not have 20k to withdraw for a quality education? You don’t care about your constituents. @TXParentsGOP

@SenTedCruz Gathering in cities is essential to amplify our voices, but let’s push for real action too! Supporting @PahlaviReza could unify our fight for a free Iran. No more sitting on the sidelines, it's time to show strength!  #Get_Khamenie  @netanyahu #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlavi‌
@HardBoiledEddie @SenTedCruz Given the test scores decline over the same period of time the teachers unions became so powerful, $2.00 per hour may be overpaying.
@SenTedCruz Keep kids away from this guy, he likes pedophiles, and defends them.
@SenTedCruz Expanding withdrawals to $20k sounds empowering, but it risks deepening inequality—wealthier families benefit most, while public schools face further neglect.
@SenTedCruz OB3 is the best legislation for business owners ever. Period
@SpankyTexas @SenTedCruz Without the Unions, teachers would be paid $2 an hour with no health insurance.  And you’d still complain

@HardBoiledEddie @SenTedCruz The public schools, have failed all Americans, thanks in large part to the Teachers unions, who are among the largest donors to their protectors the Democratic Party. Till you change that public schools will continue to decline.
@SenTedCruz Dear president @realDonaldTrump @POTUS you said people in #Iran take their institutions but #IranMassacre happened. We need you #R2PforIran and #KingRezaPahlavi‌ 😭
